titleStmt.title: Articles of direction touching alehouses Munday the xxj. of March 1607.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: The year in the title is given according to Lady Day dating.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" within a mortised ornament.
Identified as STC 9214 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
